original_text: But if anyone who is unclean eats any meat of the fellowship offering belonging to the Lord, they must be cut off from their people.
korean_text: 만일 몸이 부정한 자가 여호와께 속한 화목제물의 고기를 먹으면 그 사람은 자기 백성 중에서 끊어질 것이요

sentences.original_text: But if anyone who is unclean
eats any meat of the fellowship offering
they must be cut off from their people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 백성 중에서 끊어져야 할 것이다
